annonsrubrik: Assignment as Project Sourcing Manager Electronics
annonstext:
ValueOne is looking for a Project Sourcing Manager for an assignment at a manufacturing company with placement either in Stockholm or Timrå. The assignment is to start immediately and runs for at least 6 months. For the right candidate there is a strong possibility of being offered a permanent position after completed assignment.

The role

As Project Sourcing Manager you will  work in an organization responsible for project sourcing activities focusing on one of the company´s largest product portfolios. The responsibility for the Project Sourcing Manager is to coordinate, lead and execute the sourcing activities towards the global supplier base in product development projects and assignments. The role focuses on electronics, which means that you will be an integral part of the Electronics category team and you will be responsible for selected suppliers within the category.

Main tasks:

Make inquiries and bid evaluations Conduct supplier negotiations Take part in supplier collaborations of various sizes making sure that the deliverables are in focus at all time with all stakeholders involvedSecure time to market promises for new and changed products as well as sharp cost awarenessMonitor and maintain the long-term performance of suppliers within your area of responsibilityTake part in and drive alignment in global sourcing processes, methods, and tools

Experience and competence

The right person for this assignment has a university degree within supply chain, engineering or equivalent education along with experience from a similar role at a manufacturing company with an international footprint. The assignment also demands knowledge in business analysis, business negotiations, Lean concept and production. Quality is a big concern for you both regarding products and processes. 

Furthermore, the role requires experience from working in multiple projects and a logical as well as an analytical way of thinking. We expect you to have good relationship management and communication skills as most of the work is cross-functional and international. You are a person who are commercially driven, motivated by challenges and have the ability to push through obstacles and find opportunities. 

Application  

We look forward to receiving your application. Please apply through our webpage at: http://valueone.se/aktuella-jobb/ as soon as possible. Feel free to contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO with any questions regarding the listed position.

ValueOne are specialists in supply chain management, purchasing and logistics. We offer our customers services in three business areas: interim logistics and procurement consultants, recruitment of buyers and logisticians, as well as development of our customers’ supply chain operations in terms of strategies, models, methods, processes, structure, and competence.
